news_items.headline: S.Korea's Hanwha Q Cells to invest $2.5 bln total in U.S. solar ...
news_items.summary: S.Korea's Hanwha Q Cells to invest $2.5 bln total in U.S. solar manufacturing | Reuters REUTERS/Arnd Wiegmann Purchase Licensing Rights, opens new tab SEOUL, Jan 11 (Reuters) - South Korea's Hanwha Solutions Corp (009830.KS), opens new tab said on Wednesday its unit Hanwha Q Cells will invest a total of $2.5 billion to build a solar power manufacturing value chain in the U.S. state of Georgia through June 2025.
